ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Changes on Test for all Classes.
ygData.msgSnippet: Regarding the Druid changes: Add in the probability that they re going to nerf the Complete Heal spell (without adequately balancing the MOBs to compensate),
ygData.messageBody:
Regarding the Druid changes:

Add in the probability that they're going to nerf the Complete Heal spell (without adequately balancing
the MOBs to compensate), and you can kiss those Clerics goodbye. Sure, give great stuff to the easiest,
fastest-leveling, most widely played class in the game and nerf one of the most one-dimensional boring
classes to make them overlap even more than they do. That sure balances things.

Kenross Cantoforjado, 56 songs, Innoruuk


Chris Holden wrote:

> CHANGES ON TEST, FEBRUARY 3, 2001
> 1) Superior Healing moved to level 51 for shamans and druids. casting
> difficulty reduced
>
> 2) New level 55 Druid and shaman spell, Chloroblast, similar to remedy for
> clerics.
>
> 3) New Druid spell at level 60, upgrade to superior healing, Natures Touch.
